Name: INGRESS & STATUS CHECKS
checklistText:
INGRESS & STATUS CHECKS
Panel 2:
	SEC COOL PUMP – may be cycled from AC1
		to off (ctr) during crew ingress &
		checkout to maintain crew comfort

			CDR Ingress LH Couch
	Ingress LH couch
	CDR comm umb – conn to PGA
Panel 9:
	SUIT PWR – on (up)
	PWR – AUDIO/TONE
Panel 301:
	1h SUIT FLOW vlv – OFF
CDR O2 umb – conn to PGA

	1h SUIT FLOW vlv – FULL FLOW
	CDR O2 vent – shut off & disconnect

	Assist CDR in position; connections &
		adjustments completed

	Verify sw positions as follows:

Panel 2:
	CAB FAN (both) – on (up)
Panel 8:
	FLOAT BAG (3) – VENT
	THC – neutral (locked)
Panel 1: 
	MAN ATT ROLL – RATE CMD
	MAN ATT PITCH – ACCEL CMD
	MAN ATT YAW – RATE CMD
	SCS TVC (2) – RATE CMD
	ΔV CG – LM/CSM
	ELS AUTO – AUTO

	LMP Ingress RH Couch
	LMP comm umb – conn to PGA
Panel 6:
	SUIT PWR – on (up)
	PWR – AUDIO/TONE
Panel 300:
	rh SUIT FLOW vlv – OFF
	LMP O2 umb – conn to PGA

	rh SUIT FLOW vlv – FULL FLOW
	LMP O2 vent – shut off & disconnect

	Assist LMP in position; connections &
		adjustments completed
	Verify the following
Panel 4:
	SPS GAUGING – AC1
	GLY PUMPS – 1 AC1
Panel 3:
	VHF ANT – SM LEFT
	OXID FLOW VLV INCR – NORM
	MNA RSET – ctr
	MNB RSET – ctr
	SPS He VLV (both) – AUTO
	S BD ANT OMNI A – B
	S BD ANT OMNI – OMNI
	VHF BCN – OFF
	SCE PWR – NORM
	AC 1 RSET – ctr
	AC 2 RSET – ctr

	CMP Ingress Center Couch
	CMP comm umb – conn to PGA
Panel 10:
	SUIT PWR – on (up)
	PWR – AUDIO/TONE
Panel 302:
	ctr SUIT FLOW vlv – OFF
	CMP O2 vent – shut off & disconnect

	Assist CMP in position; connections &
		adjustments completed

	Perform fnl crew verification

	Verify the following
Panel 2:
	PRPLNT DUMP – AUTO
	C/W NORM – BOOST
	MSN TMR – START
	SUIT H2O ACCUM AUTO – 1
	SUIT COMPR ΔP ind – 0.7-0.9 psid
Panel 6, 10, 9:
	VHF AM VOL tw (3) – as desired
	S BD VOL tw (3) – as desired
Panel 3:
	UP TLM CMD – NORM
Panel 2:
	UP TLM CM – BLOCK
Panel 10:
	PAD COMM – OFF

	Egress CM

	EDS Checkout & Countdown Test
Panel 8:
	cb EDS (3) – close (verify)
Panel 7:
	EDS PWR – on (up)
Panel 2:
	EDS AUTO – on (up)
Panel 1:
	ABORT lt oper – verify
Panel 3:
	UP TLM CMD – OFF
Panel 9:
	S BD – OFF
	INTERCOM – OFF
	VHF AM – OFF
Panel 6:
	PAD COMM – OFF

	Cabin Closeout
	I left the procedures below, but use the "Toggle Hatch" button to 
	close the hatch.
Side hatch:
	Side hatch closing
		Verify external tool stowed on
			outside of hatch (tech)
		Remove hatch seal protector (tech)
		Verify safety pin has been removed
			from actr handle sel (tech)
		Gear box sel – N (neut) (tech)
		Actr handle sel – N (neut) (tech)
		GN2 vlv handle – push (outbd) (tech)
		Verify piston chamber pressurized

		If piston chamber is not pressurized
			GN@ charge No. 1 – CW (tech)

		Hatch open lock – rel (tech)
		Push hatch to near closed
			position (tech)
		Lock pin rel knob – UNLOCK (verify)
		Hold hatch closed
			Insert tool B (handle in 9 o’clock
			position) into external hatch
			actuation socket, rot CW to
			stops & hold (tech)
		Press & hold LOCK PIN reset button
		Relax torque & remove tool B (tech)

		LOCK PIN reset button – rel
		LOCK PIN ind – not extd (rh couch)
			&/or white ind is opposite white
			mrk (ctr & 1h couch)

If lock pin is not engaged 
Insert tool B into external hatch 
actuation socket & slowly rot
CCW until LMP verifies lock pin
engagement (tech)

		NOTE
If RED lock pin is extd ≈ 0.5 inch,
lock pin has been sheared.

GN2 press ind – green (verify)

Configure hatch for rapid egress
	Gear box sel – UNLATCH
	Actr handle sel – U (unlatch)
	BPC JETT knob – arrow on knob
		pointing to BPC JETT decal

Strut unlock lanyard (2) – unstow &
	attach handle ends to MDC
Grd performs cab purge & hatch leak test
	Cab purge to 60% O2/40% N2
		(launch atmosphere)
	Grd performs hatch leak test

		CAUTION
During this check, established
SUIT/CAB ΔP should be maintained
by DIRECT O2 vlv.

	Change Launch Azimuth (if necessary)
Panel 2:
Key V78E
	FL V06 N29
		X SM launch azimuth  XXX.XX DEG
		Key V21E, load new azimuth
		PRO
	CAB FAN (both) – OFF

EDS Test Complete
Set cont after test
Panel 9:
		INTERCOM – T/R
		VHF AM – T/R
		S BD – T/R
Panel 6:
		PAD COMM – T/R
Panel 7:
		EDS PWR – OFF
Panel 2:
		EDS AUTO – OFF (verify)
		2 ENG OUT sw – AUTO (verify)
		LV RATES sw – AUTO (verify)
Panel 1:
		α/Pc ind - ____%
Panel 2:
		UP TLM IU – BLOCK
Panel 8:
		SCS ELECTRONICS PWR - ECA
